titles.title: School-As-Lender Reform Act of 2005
School-As-Lender Reform Act of 2005
To establish additional safeguards on schools acting as lenders under the Federal Family Education Loan Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary: School-As-Lender Reform Act of 2005 - Amends Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish additional requirements for institutions of higher education to be eligible lenders under the Federal Family Education Loan Program.
